name: OneCrowd
description: Crowdinvesting/exchange platform enabling public to own and trade shares in passion assets, such as classic cars, art, wine, and more. Such investments have yielded important returns in the past 10 years, yet benefiting only high net individuals. Onecrowd makes passion investments accessible to all.

jobs.title: CTO / technical co-founder
jobs.description:
Exciting early stage fintech based in London seeks extremely talented developers to help pioneer the passion investing sector. You will take part in creating the first stock exchange for passion assets, such as classic cars, art, wine, and more. This sector has been restricted to the happy few, OneCrowd seeks to opening it up to the larger public, making passion assets a new investment opportunity for all. 

You will be in charge of developing the platform/mobile app and should be able to do so in about one-third the time that most competent people think possible. You will be joining the starting core team and evolve fast into setting up and managing the technical team. We are currently expanding and looking for skilled and dynamic developers, digital marketeers and data scientists. Expect talented, motivated, intense, and interesting co-workers and culture. 

We have gathered great feedback from the sector and have the support of established investors. Your compensation will include equity ownership. 

Similar expertise in fintech platforms is a big plus, understanding of passion asset sector is encouraged. Familiarity with React would be helpful.
